item.description:
The Gardeners Gathering is a FREE citywide event for garden enthusiasts. Walk-in registration includes a pair of gardening gloves!

Join us for nearly 30 skill-building workshops on topics from container gardening and seed starting to food preservation and urban beekeeping. The full Event Schedule is available here: http://bostonnatural.org/evtGardenersGathering.htm.

The Gathering also features the 11th Annual Community Garden Awards, presented by Mayor Menino, honoring amazing contributions to our city's gardens.
item.name: 38th Annual Gardeners Gathering
